price: Sεdeε me Wura Nyankopͻn de me bͻne akyε me, na Ɔde me aka animuonyamfoͻ no ho a”.
arabic: بِمَا غَفَرَ لِي رَبِّي وَجَعَلَنِي مِنَ ٱلۡمُكۡرَمِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: bimā ghafara lī rabbī wajaʿalanī mina al-muk'ramīna
